projects.name: L-Guard
projects.tagline: Smart helmet system for road safety
projects.description: A smart helmet system to enhance road safety for motorcyclists and bicyclists in Rwanda. Features real-time monitoring, collision detection, and emergency alerts.
projects.problemStatement: Motorcycle accidents are a leading cause of death in Rwanda, with many riders lacking proper safety equipment and emergency response systems.
projects.solution: We developed a smart helmet with integrated sensors for collision detection, GPS tracking, and automatic emergency alerts. The companion mobile app provides real-time monitoring and emergency contact notifications.
projects.impact: Potential to reduce motorcycle fatalities by 30% through early detection and rapid emergency response.
projects.judgesComments: Impressive hardware integration and clear market need. Well-executed prototype with strong potential for real-world impact.

projects.name: Ndimension
projects.description: An AI-powered diagnostic platform that helps healthcare workers in rural areas diagnose common diseases using smartphone cameras and machine learning.
projects.problemStatement: Rural healthcare facilities lack diagnostic equipment and specialists, leading to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment.
projects.solution: Our platform uses computer vision and machine learning to analyze images from smartphone cameras, providing preliminary diagnoses for common conditions. It supports offline functionality for areas with limited connectivity.
projects.impact: Enabling accurate diagnoses in remote areas, potentially serving 10,000+ patients in rural Rwanda.
projects.judgesComments: Strong technical implementation with significant healthcare impact. Offline functionality is a game-changer for rural deployment.

projects.name: Sentra Safeguard
projects.tagline: GPS-based safety alerts for vulnerable communities
projects.description: A mobile safety application that provides real-time location tracking, emergency alerts, and community safety features for vulnerable populations.
projects.problemStatement: Women and vulnerable groups face safety concerns when traveling, especially in unfamiliar areas or at night.
projects.solution: Sentra Safeguard provides one-touch emergency alerts, live location sharing with trusted contacts, and crowdsourced safety ratings for different areas. The app includes an AI-powered risk assessment feature.
projects.impact: Creating safer communities by empowering users with real-time safety information and rapid emergency response.
projects.judgesComments: Well-designed solution addressing a critical social need. Strong UX and community-focused features.

projects.name: AgriConnect
projects.tagline: Connecting farmers to markets via blockchain
projects.description: A blockchain-based platform connecting smallholder farmers directly to buyers, eliminating middlemen and ensuring fair pricing through smart contracts.
projects.problemStatement: Smallholder farmers lose 40% of their earnings to middlemen who exploit information asymmetry in agricultural markets.
projects.solution: AgriConnect uses blockchain technology to create transparent supply chains, with smart contracts ensuring automatic payment upon delivery verification. Farmers can list products directly, and buyers can verify origin and quality.
projects.impact: Potential to increase farmer income by 35% while reducing food waste through direct market access.
projects.judgesComments: Innovative use of blockchain for social impact. Strong business model with clear value proposition.

projects.name: EduStream
projects.tagline: Offline-first education platform for remote areas
projects.description: An adaptive learning platform that works offline, syncing content when connectivity is available. Uses AI to personalize learning paths for students in areas with limited internet access.
projects.problemStatement: Students in rural Rwanda miss 60% of online learning opportunities due to unreliable internet connectivity.
projects.solution: EduStream is a Progressive Web App that downloads lessons when online, then works completely offline. AI algorithms adapt content difficulty based on student performance, all running locally on the device.
projects.impact: Enabling continuous education for 50,000+ students in areas with intermittent connectivity.
projects.judgesComments: Excellent offline-first architecture. Addresses a critical educational gap with technical excellence.
